statements: SELECT user_id, location, preference_1, preference_2 FROM user_preferences;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT user_id, preference_1 FROM user_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_2 IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT location, preference_1 FROM user_preferences WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT user_id, location, preference_1, preference_2 FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_1 LIKE '%food%';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT user_id, location FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences
SELECT user_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM user_preferences
SELECT preference_name, user_id, preference_value FROM user_preferences ORDER BY preference_name DESC
SELECT location_name, region FROM locations
SELECT user_id, location_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 123
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, location_id FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_name = 'theme';
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE location_id IN (SELECT location_id FROM locations WHERE region = 'Europe');
SELECT preference_name, COUNT(*) AS preference_count FROM user_preferences GROUP BY preference_name ORDER BY preference_count DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location_name, region FROM locations ORDER BY region ASC, location_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, preference_name FROM user_preferences WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, country FROM locations WHERE location_id = 5;
SELECT content_id, content_name, content_type FROM content ORDER BY content_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 3 AND location_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT preference_name, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, location_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM user_preferences JOIN locations ON user_preferences.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT content_name, content_type, location_name FROM content JOIN locations ON content.location_id = locations.location_id ORDER BY location_name ASC, content_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS total_users FROM user_preferences;
SELECT * FROM users_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, location_id FROM users_preferences WHERE preference_type = 'color';
SELECT location_name, country FROM locations WHERE continent = 'Europe' ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, category, price FROM content_items WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = 10 ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users_preferences;
SELECT username, preference_type FROM users_preferences WHERE location_id IS NULL;
SELECT location_name, country, continent FROM locations ORDER BY country ASC;
SELECT item_name, category, price FROM content_items WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM user_activity WHERE activity_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM user_locations
SELECT user_id, location_id FROM user_locations
SELECT city, country FROM locations
SELECT * FROM preferences WHERE user_id = '1111-2222-3333'
SELECT content_id, content_type FROM content
SELECT * FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT location_id, country FROM locations WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT user_id, preference_key, preference_value FROM preferences WHERE user_id = '98765432-12ab-cdef-1234-567812345678' ORDER BY preference_key ASC;
SELECT content_id, content_type, content_description FROM content WHERE content_type = 'article' AND content_description LIKE '%tutorial%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, content_id, preference_value FROM user_content_preferences WHERE user_id = 'abcdef12-3456-7890-abcd-ef1234567890' ORDER BY preference_value DESC;
